name: Bonnie and Clyde
overview: In the game, set in the 30s, our protagonists must fight to the end against the law of the United States; And given their status as outlaws, these champions of organized crime will fight with all their means at their disposal. So much so that, in this arcade platformer, our Clyde - in a cat version - will be able to use his weapon to get rid of the police, and go through the screens in search of the dynamite that he will need to pass the level.
